bs-avatars-desc: Provides generic and individual user pictures
apihelp-bs-avatars-tasks-summary: Uploading, generating and setting user avatars
bs-avatars-tag-profileimage-error-invali: Parameter "username" is required and must contain a valid username
bs-avatars-pref-generator-help: The avatar image is generated when a user does not upload a profile picture. InstantAvatar: Generates an avatar image based on using the initials of the real name or the username fields. Identicon: Generates an avatar image based on parts of the user's ID
bs-avatars-generate-description: Generate new automatic avatar. This will permanently replace any uploaded profile image (if set)
